message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice. Time is ticking and the value is decreasing!
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle a bit. This deal feels fair to me.
Alice, this is a good deal for both of us.  We need to agree soon before inflation eats away at the value!
Bob, let's be realistic. This offer reflects the time pressure we're both under. Take it or leave it.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.  Take it before we both lose!
